topic.title: DITA Map to PDF - based on DITA and CSS (WYSIWYG) Customization

body.p: comes bundled with the DITA Open Toolkit that provides a mechanism for converting DITA maps to PDF output.

This transformation type converts DITA maps to PDF using a CSS-based processing engine and a merged DITA map (one with all topics expanded inline) as an intermediate format. The complete customization documentation can be found here: . For this transformation, the pdf-css transtype is used.
